nodes.bodyText: This is normally a section at the end of the normal dependencies, before the test dependencies.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,24 @@
     </properties>
 
     <dependencies>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>io.prestosql</groupId>
+            <artifactId>presto-testing</artifactId>
+            <scope>runtime</scope>
+        </dependency>
+
+        <!-- used by tests but also needed transitively -->

nodes.bodyText:
This is strange. Just add an exclusion for the dependency checker.
https://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-dependency-plugin/examples/exclude-dependencies-from-dependency-analysis.html
Actually, it looks like this test could go in presto-testing?
I wanted the exclusion to go away when we remove this test class.
